explain below like in pattern why we didn't used Customer Class array instead of member in Store classpackage temp;

interface member{
	
	public void callback();
	
}



class customer implements member{
	
	
	String S;
	
	public customer(String name) {
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	this.S = name;
	}
	
	public void callback() {
		System.out.println("hi I will visit the Store"+this.S);
	}
	
	
}



class Store{
	
	member m[] = new member[10];
	int count;
	
	public void register(member m) {
		this.m[count++] = m;
	}
	
	public void InviteForSale() {
		
		
		for(int i =0;i<count;i++) {
			this.m[i].callback();
		}
	}
	
	
	
	
	
}



public class InterFace {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		
		customer s1 = new customer("John");
		customer s2 = new customer("Domnik");
		customer s3 = new customer("Peter");
		
		Store store = new Store();
		store.register(s1);
		store.register(s2);
		store.register(s3);
		
		
		store.InviteForSale();
		
	}

}
